title: Search Advertising Campaign
description: Search Advertising Campaign Class includes fields that defines Campaign Entity on Search Advertising Platform.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: External Campaign ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: External Campaign ID on the search advertising platform.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Search Engine ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Internal Identifier that determines which search advertising platform the data is pulled from.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Search Advertising Platform
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Defines Name of the Search Advertising Platform for the Campaign.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Account ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Account Identifier (Internal Key) campaign belongs to.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Portfolio Identifier
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Portfolio Identifier (Internal Key) is populated if assigned to a campaign.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Budget Type
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Budget Type indicates how the allocated budget will be spent

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Ad Delivery Method
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Ad Delivery method can determine how long your budget lasts

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Objective
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Campaign Objective indicates the primary objective of the campaign - e.g. Promotions, Brands, App Installs.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Creation Time of the Campaign in Adobe Platform
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Creation Time in UTC when Campaign got created in Adobe Platform.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Modified Time of the Campaign in Adobe Platform
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Modified Time in UTC when Campaign got modified in Adobe Platform.
